com.rand42.database

Interface IItemsDataSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ItemsDataSource

    public interface IItemsDataSource
    Class that interfaces with the database for items

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the datasource.

      Deletes an item by id

      Searches categories and names for items

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
          throws android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException
        Opens the datasource. Must be called before any other operation
        Throws:
        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the datasource. Should be called after read/write operations have completed

      • createItem

        void createItem(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String description,
              User owner,
              java.util.Date date,
              boolean lost,
              java.lang.String category)
        Creates a new item in the database
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item
        description - Description of the item
        owner - The User associated with items
        date - Date object
        lost - Lost status
        category - Category string

      • deleteItem

        boolean deleteItem(long id)
        Deletes an item by id
        Parameters:
        id - The id param of the item
        Returns:
        true if deletion was successful

      • getAllUserItems

        java.util.List<Item> getAllUserItems(User user)
        Gets all items associated with a user
        Parameters:
        user - The associated user
        Returns:
        list of items associated with user

      • getItemById

        Item getItemById(long id)
        Gets an item by its id param
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the item
        Returns:
        The item

      • search

        java.util.List<Item> search(java.lang.String query)
        Searches categories and names for items
        Parameters:
        query - The search query
        Returns:
        Search Results
